snippet.title: Distance - The Ghost Update
snippet.description:
TWITTER: http://twitter.com/refractstudios
FACEBOOK: http://facebook.com/refractstudios
STEAM: http://store.steampowered.com/app/233610
MUSIC: http://twitter.com/torcht

Be sure to watch all the way through for something cool!

The Ghost Update is our most ambitious update to Distance yet. It features ghost racing, a replay viewer, official HTC Vive support, an increased online player limit, a new stats system, and tons of other improvements! Now available via Steam!

LEARN MORE: http://steamcommunity.com/games/distance/announcements/detail/528442555300592876
